long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This retro-inspired live wallpaper brings the DeLorean to life, with animated effects that recreate the thrill of time travel. Watch as the sleek, silver sports car glides across your screen, complete with its glowing flux capacitor and futuristic design. Perfect for fans of classic cars, time travel, and 80s nostalgia, this wallpaper is designed to transform your new tab into a portal to the past and future.
